kpi_info.title: MB average load ratio - EMB
kpi_info.use:
This is the average load of the message bus during the measurement period. KPI used for Ethernet based message bus.

PUBLISHED: M14.0

LAST UPDATE: 01-09-2010

THEORETICAL SUMMARY LEVELS: PLMN - MSC / PLMN - UNIT / PLMN - PIU / PLMN - INTERFACE / PLMN - TRANSDIR
RECOMMENDED SUMMARY LEVELS: PLMN - MSC / PLMN - UNIT

KPI CLASS: Resource

MEASUREMENT(S): LAN EMB Load Measurement (M293/125H)

NOTES: This NSN KPI is compliant with ex-S "MSC Processor Load" KPI.
